Name: Adventure in Kana Village
About the game: Save the princess by learning Japanese kana The evil devil has tied the princess! Only by learning the Japanese Kana can you defeat the devil and save the princess. After you save the princess, you can... がんばってください~~~~~ ヽ(✿ﾟ▽ﾟ)ノ Collecting Cards from Gacha This is a unique place in the game. How many times do you need to get the five-stars card? Exquisite Style and Deisn Every place has been carefully designed and adjusted, we strive for a better gaming experience. Want Beautiful Collections？ Yes, Yes, we have prepared for you, my dear playes. We designed a lot of Japanese-style drop items for you, hoping to drop your favorite.(〜￣△￣)〜 Suggestions or Ideas If you have good suggestions or ideas, welcome to share with me, I will seriously think it.(°∀°)ﾉ ------------------notice-------------------------- The recommendations in the comments have been comprehensively revised and supplemented.
